title: Episode 202: Look at These Lips (Feat. Raheem DeVaughn)
itunes:title: Episode 202: Look at These Lips (Feat. Raheem DeVaughn)
description:
R&B singer Raheem DeVaughn joins the ladies of Lip Service this week and things get spicy when Angela Yee brings out a giant box of sex toys! Angela hands out gifts for everyone to use as homework for next weeks episode. The ladies discuss whether you'd rather have an independent mate or not, being a side piece, having great sex but hating the person, and much more. Enjoy!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
